name: Gomu Gomu no Mi
description: The Gomu Gomu no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that grants the user's body the properties of rubber, effectively making them a Rubber Human (ゴム人間, Gomu Ningen?). Originally, the fruit was called Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Nika and classified as a Mythical Zoan-type fruit that allows one to transform into the legendary "Sun God" Nika (and gain his rubbery attributes), before being renamed and reclassified by the World Government to hide the truth. In the present, only a few are aware of the fruit's true nature, and its existence was never known to be recorded anywhere.

Japanese Name: ヒトヒトの実 モデル「ニカ」
Romanized Name: Hito Hito no Mi Moderu Nika

name: Bara Bara no Mi
description: The Bara Bara no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to split their own body into pieces and control said pieces however they wish, as well as making the user immune to slashing attacks, making the user a Splitting Human (バラバラ人間, Barabara Ningen?). It was eaten by Buggy, albeit by accident as he originally intended to sell it.

name: Sube Sube no Mi
description: The Sube Sube no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that makes the user's body smooth and slippery, which in turn makes most attacks and objects slide off their body, protecting the user from harm in most situations. As seen with Alvida, if one is overweight in any way they will become slim by having the excess fat "slip off". It was eaten by Alvida.

name: Bomu Bomu no Mi
description: The Bomu Bomu no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to make any part of their body explode, whether it be their limbs, hair, mucus, even breath or cough, making the user a Bomb Human (爆弾人間, Bakudan Ningen?, VIZ: "Human Dynamite"). It was eaten by Gem, better known by his Baroque Works alias Mr. 5.

Statistics.Official English Name: Bomb-Bomb Fruit (4Kids, Funimation, Odex); Boom-Boom Fruit (Viz)

name: Kiro Kiro no Mi
description: The Kiro Kiro no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to change their weight from 1 to 10,000 kilograms without, in any way, affecting the overall size of their body. It was eaten by Mikita.

name: Hana Hana no Mi
description: The Hana Hana no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to replicate and sprout pieces of their body from the surface of any object or living thing. As further allusion to this, pinkish-white petal-like particles form at and then swirl away from where the parts sprout and vanish, as well as around the user itself. It was eaten by Nico Robin.

name: Doru Doru no Mi
description: The Doru Doru no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create large quantities of candle wax from their body and control it, making the user a Candle Human (ろうそく（キャンドル）人間, Kyandoru Ningen?, VIZ: "Human Candle", "Wax Man"). It was eaten by Galdino, better known by his Baroque Works alias, Mr. 3.

name: Baku Baku no Mi
description: The Baku Baku no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to eat otherwise-inedible objects, then later manifesting them from their body. It was eaten by Wapol, king of the Black Drum Kingdom.

name: Mane Mane no Mi
description: The Mane Mane no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to turn themselves into a physical double of anyone they touch, making the user an Imitating Human (マネ人間, Mane Ningen?, VIZ: "Mimic man"). It was eaten by former Baroque Works agent Bentham, also known by the alias Mr. 2 Bon Kurei.

Statistics.Fruit Debut: One Piece Magazine Special Feature: The Wings -Zoro & Sanji- 018

name: Supa Supa no Mi
description: The Supa Supa no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that enables the user's body to gain characteristics of a steel blade to attack opponents with, making the user a Full-Body Bladed Human (全身刃物人間, Zenshin Hamono Ningen?, VIZ: "Human Sword"). It was eaten by former Baroque Works agent and current Cross Guild member Daz Bonez, also known by his alias Mr. 1.

Statistics.Fruit Debut: One Piece Magazine Special Feature: The Wings -Zoro & Sanji- 018

name: Toge Toge no Mi
description: The main strength of this fruit is that it allows the user to sprout long and sharp spikes from their body. This means that the user can transform any of their body parts, be it their arms, feet, facial features or even hair, into a deadly spear and quickly impale anything in their way.

name: Ori Ori no Mi
description: The Ori Ori no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to bind their foes in iron shackles created by the user's body. It was eaten by Hina.

name: Bane Bane no Mi
description: The Bane Bane no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to turn their limbs into springs, making the user a Spring Human (バネ人間, Bane Ningen?). It was eaten by Bellamy.

name: Ito Ito no Mi
description: The Ito Ito no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create and manipulate strings, making the user a String Human (糸人間, Ito Ningen?). It was eaten by the former Warlord of the Sea Donquixote Doflamingo.

name: Noro Noro no Mi
description: The Noro Noro no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to emit beams which temporarily slow down their target, making the user a Noroma Human (ノロマ人間, Noroma Ningen?, Viz: "Slowpoke Human"). It was eaten by Foxy the Silver Fox.

name: Doa Doa no Mi
description: The Doa Doa no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create doors through anything they touch, making the user a Door Human (ドア人間, Doa Ningen?). The doors they create can be created from any part of their body, from the palm of their hands to their whole body itself, and usually take the shape and form of the body part creating it. The doors remain as passageways anyone can pass through until closed completely. It was eaten by Blueno.

name: Awa Awa no Mi
description: The Awa Awa no Mi is a Paramecia type Devil Fruit that allows the user to emit and control soap and bubbles that can not only clean off dirt but can also "clean off" power, making the user a Soap Human (石鹸人間, Sekken Ningen?). It was eaten by Kalifa, who received it from Spandam.

name: Beri Beri no Mi
description: The Beri Beri no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform their body parts into a multitude of berry-like balls, making the user a Grape Human (ブドウ人間, Budō Ningen?). It was eaten by Very Good.

name: Sabi Sabi no Mi
description: The Sabi Sabi no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to cause metallic items to rust and break, making the user a Rust Human (サビ人間, Sabi Ningen?). It was eaten by Marine Captain Shu.

name: Shari Shari no Mi
description: The Shari Shari no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform their arms and feet into wheels, making the user a Wheel Human (車輪人間, Sharin Ningen?). It was eaten by Sharinguru.

name: Horo Horo no Mi
description: The Horo Horo no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to conjure ghosts, making the user a Ghost Human (霊体人間, Reitai Ningen?). It was eaten by Perona.

name: Yomi Yomi no Mi
description: The Yomi Yomi no Mi is a spherical-shaped golden fruit with a green stem. On its bottom, it has four stubby growths, making the shape resemble a skull. As with most Devil Fruits, it has swirl patterns throughout.

name: Kage Kage no Mi
description: The Kage Kage no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that gives the user the ability to manifest and control shadows of living creatures, including their own, as physical and tangible forms. The user, becoming a Ruler of Shadows (影の支配者, Kage no Shihaisha?, VIZ: Master of Shadows), can steal the shadows of other beings and insert them into different bodies, living or dead, which in the latter case enables the creation of zombies.

name: Suke Suke no Mi
description: It was initially eaten by Absalom, and after his death it was transferred to Shiryu.

name: Nikyu Nikyu no Mi
description: This fruit's abilities were duplicated in the Seraph S-Bear, via a transfusion of Green Blood.

name: Toshi Toshi no Mi
description: The Toshi Toshi no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to manipulate the ages of people or objects, making them an Age Manipulation Human (年齢自在人間, Nenrei Jizai Ningen?). As part of an experiment, Jaygarcia Saturn administered an extract of the fruit to Jewelry Bonney when she was an infant.

name: Jiki Jiki no Mi
description: The Jiki Jiki no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit which allows the user to create magnetic forces and use them to control metal. It was eaten by Eustass Kid.

name: Ope Ope no Mi
description: The Ope Ope no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit whose ability is to create a spherical domain in which the user can freely rearrange, take apart (without harm), and generally remodel the structure/anatomy of anything and anyone (themselves included) in a "surgical" way, making the user a Free Modification Human (改造自在人間, Kaizō Jizai Ningen?). The fruit was eaten by Trafalgar D. Water Law, having been force-fed to him by Donquixote Rosinante. Before Law, the fruit's powers were held by a certain famous doctor.

name: Shiro Shiro no Mi
description: The Shiro Shiro no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to become a living fortress, making the user a Castle Human (城人間, Shiro Ningen?). It was eaten by Capone Bege. Its powers were first revealed in the Sabaody Archipelago Arc, but the name of the fruit was not given until the Zou Arc.

name: Wara Wara no Mi
description: The Wara Wara no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create and manipulate straw at will, with the straw having damage-redirecting properties. It was eaten by Basil Hawkins.

name: Oto Oto no Mi
description: The Oto Oto no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit which allows the user to transform parts of their body into musical instruments and play music with a variety of destructive effects. It was eaten by Scratchmen Apoo.

name: Mero Mero no Mi
description: The Mero Mero no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows a range of attacks which use emotions of love, lust or adoration to transform opponents into stone. It was eaten by the former Warlord Boa Hancock, who was force-fed it by a World Noble.

name: Doku Doku no Mi
description: The Doku Doku no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that grants the user the ability to produce and control different types of poison, as well as grants immunity to all forms of poison, making the user a Poison Human (毒人間, Doku Ningen?). It was eaten by Magellan.

name: Horu Horu no Mi
description: The Horu Horu no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that grants the user the ability to create a variety of special hormones that can alter the recipient's body in any way the user desires, making the user a Hormone Controlling Human (ホルモン自在人間, Horumon Jizai Ningen?). It was eaten by Emporio Ivankov sometime after the God Valley Incident.

Official English Name: Hor-Hor Fruit (One Piece Official YouTube Channel)

name: Choki Choki no Mi
description: The Choki Choki no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform parts of their body into scissors and cut solid objects as if they were paper, making the user a Scissors Human (ハサミ人間, Hasami Ningen?). It was eaten by Inazuma.

Official English Name: Shear-Shear Fruit (One Piece Official YouTube Channel)

name: Gura Gura no Mi
description: The Gura Gura no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit which allows the user to create vibrations, or "quakes", making the user a Tremor Human (震動人間, Shindō Ningen?). It was eaten by Edward Newgate, but upon his death, its power was stolen by Marshall D. Teach.

name: Kira Kira no Mi
description: The Kira Kira no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit which allows the user to transform their body into diamond. It was eaten by Jozu.

name: Poke Poke no Mi
description: The main strength of this fruit is that it allows the user to store various things inside pockets in their body. The objects stored inside can be much larger than the opening of the pocket, as they change size accordingly. It is stated that the user can have infinite pockets in their person, effectively giving them limitless storage capacity.

name: Woshu Woshu no Mi
description: The Woshu Woshu no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to literally "wash and hang out to dry" people and objects as if they were clothes, making the user a Laundry Human (洗濯人間, Sentaku Ningen?, VIZ: "Washer Human"). It was eaten by Tsuru.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ウォシュウォシュの実

name: Fuwa Fuwa no Mi
description: The Fuwa Fuwa no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to levitate themselves and non-living things into the air. It was eaten by Shiki.

name: Deka Deka no Mi
description: The Deka Deka  no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows its user to drastically enlarge their body, making them a Gigantification Human (巨大化人間, Kyodai-ka Ningen?). It was eaten by Sanjuan Wolf.

name: Mato Mato no Mi
description: The Mato Mato no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that makes the user capable of aiming at whichever "target" he decides upon from any location and at any time with anything at ease. It was eaten by Flying Pirates captain Vander Decken IX.

name: Fuku Fuku no Mi
description: The Fuku Fuku no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit which allows the user to create clothing and other apparel out of leaves or stones by visualizing them. It was eaten by Kin'emon.

Official English Name: Garb-Garb Fruit (One Piece Official YouTube Channel)

name: Hobi Hobi no Mi
description: The Hobi Hobi no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform living people into toys, and erase memories of their existence from others. It has a secondary side effect of granting the eater eternal youth. It was eaten by Sugar.

name: Buki Buki no Mi
description: The Buki Buki no Mi is a Paramecia type Devil Fruit that gives the user the ability to change their body parts into any weapon, which lets the user become a Full-Body Weapon Human (全身武器人間, Zenshin Buki Ningen?). It was eaten by Baby 5.

Statistics.Romanized Name: Buki Buki no Mi

name: Guru Guru no Mi
description: The Guru Guru no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform any part of their body or piece of worn clothing into propellers capable of rotation at high speed, becoming a Rotation Human (回転人間, Kaiten Ningen?). It was eaten by Buffalo.

name: Beta Beta no Mi
description: The Beta Beta no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create and control mucus, making the user a Mucus Human (粘液人間, Nen'eki Ningen?, VIZ: "Mucus-Man"). It was eaten by Trebol.

name: Zushi Zushi no Mi
description: The Zushi Zushi no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit which allows the user to create and manipulate gravitational forces. It was eaten by Issho, better known as Admiral Fujitora.

name: Bari Bari no Mi
description: The Bari Bari no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to generate barriers, making them a Barrier Human (バリア人間, Baria Ningen?). It was previously eaten by Kurozumi Semimaru, and upon its reincarnation it was eaten by Bartolomeo.

name: Nui Nui no Mi
description: The Nui Nui no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that grants the user the ability to stitch things together and un-stitch them like if nothing had happened. It was eaten by Leo.

Official English Name: Sew-Sew Fruit (One Piece Official YouTube Channel)

name: Giro Giro no Mi
description: The Giro Giro no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to see through everything and read the minds of others, allowing the user to become an Insight Human (眼力人間, Ganriki Ningen?, Viz: Eagle-Eyed Seer). It was eaten by Viola.

name: Ato Ato no Mi
description: The Ato Ato no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to turn people or objects into abstract art, turning the user into an Art Human (芸術（アート）人間, Āto Ningen?). It was eaten by Giolla.

name: Jake Jake no Mi
description: The Jake Jake no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to become a jacket and be worn by others, which makes them a Jacket Human (ジャケット人間, Jaketto Ningen?). It was eaten by Kelly Funk.

name: Pamu Pamu no Mi
description: The Pamu Pamu no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to cause their own body or any inorganic object they touch to rupture and explode, turning them into a Puncture Human (破裂（パンク）人間, Panku Ningen?, Viz: "Rupture-Man"; Funimation: "Rupture Man"). It was eaten by Gladius.

name: Sui Sui no Mi
description: The Sui Sui no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to swim in the ground or walls, making the user a Free-Swimming Human (遊泳自由人間, Yūei Jiyū Ningen?, Viz: Free Swimmer). It was eaten by Senor Pink.

name: Ton Ton no Mi
description: The Ton Ton no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit which allows the user to increase their weight, making them a Super Weight Human (超体重（スーパーウエイト）人間, Sūpā Weito Ningen?). It was eaten by the former Donquixote Family combatant Machvise.

name: Hira Hira no Mi
description: The Hira Hira no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to make their body and any object they touch become flat and flexible, letting solid objects ripple, billow, and flutter like a piece of cloth or a flag. The user is described as a Flag Human (旗（フラッグ）人間, Furaggu Ningen?, VIZ: Flag-Man) due to the visual effect of these powers. It was eaten by Diamante.

Official English Name: Ripple-Ripple Fruit (VIZ Media, Funimation subs, Funimation dub (main series));

name: Ishi Ishi no Mi
description: The Ishi Ishi no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to merge with and manipulate stone, making the user a Stone Assimilation Human (岩石同化人間, Ganseki Dōka Ningen?, VIZ: "Stone-Assimilation Man"). It was eaten by Pica.

name: Fude Fude no Mi
description: The fruit is shaped like the lower part of a gourd, having a very narrow top before widening out significantly. It notably possesses two colors, with its top half being dark-colored and the bottom being light-colored (the exact colors are currently unknown as the anime scene where the fruit was shown was in black and white). While the bottom half possesses normal Devil Fruit spirals, the top half possesses a more unusual fishhook-shaped pattern set. The fruit has a horizontal-shaped stem which curves in an upward spiral on the left side and a downward spiral on the right.

name: Nagi Nagi no Mi
description: The Nagi Nagi no Mi is a Paramecia-class Devil Fruit that allows the user to create a soundproof field and to cancel all noises, making the user a Soundless Human (無音人間, Muon Ningen?, Funimation dub: "Silent Man"). It was eaten by Donquixote Rosinante, but with his death, the fruit has returned to circulation.

name: Chiyu Chiyu no Mi
description: The Chiyu Chiyu no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that grants the user the ability to heal any wound or injury through the use of liquid that comes from the user's body, such as tears. It was eaten by Mansherry.

name: Maki Maki no Mi
description: The Maki Maki no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create and control scrolls at will, which have special properties including storing objects and generating drawings. It was eaten by Raizo.

Official English Name: Scroll-Scroll Fruit (One Piece Official YouTube Channel)

name: Soru Soru no Mi
description: The Soru Soru no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to interact with and manipulate souls. It was formerly eaten by Carmel, but the ability was somehow transferred to Charlotte Linlin after Carmel's death.

name: Mira Mira no Mi
description: The foremost strength of the fruit is that it allows the user to create multiple mirrors in their own vicinity with their own hands. These mirrors can be used as a shield against enemy attacks, absorbing them and reflecting them back at the attacker, turning their own power against them.

name: Pero Pero no Mi
description: This fruit allows the user to create and control seemingly limitless amounts of candy, even being able to make it move as if it were a mechanical construct, like escalators and prostheses. The candy created by the user is edible.

name: Bisu Bisu no Mi
description: The Bisu Bisu no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to generate and manipulate biscuits at will, making them a Biscuit Human (ビスケット人間, Bisuketto Ningen?, VIZ: "Biscuitman"). It was eaten by Charlotte Cracker.

name: Bata Bata no Mi
description: This fruit allows the user to control seemingly limitless amounts of butter. Despite butter usually making objects slippery, the created butter has been shown to be quite sticky and adhesive when in semi-liquid form, capable of immobilizing an opponent by wrapping it around their hands or bodies.

name: Buku Buku no Mi
description: The Buku Buku no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to manipulate books, making them a Book Human (書籍人間, Shoseki Ningen?, VIZ: "Bookkeeper"). It was eaten by Charlotte Mont-d'Or.

name: Kuri Kuri no Mi
description: The Kuri Kuri no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create and manipulate cream at will, making them a Cream Human (クリーム人間, Kurīmu Ningen?). It was eaten by Charlotte Opera.

name: Shibo Shibo no Mi
description: This fruit's main strength is the ability to extract liquid from both living creatures (the user included) and inanimate objects, with the user's hands. The user simply has to squeeze and twist the chosen target (akin to wringing out a soaked cloth) to extract liquid from them. Notably, she requires physical contact to squeeze them, posing a problem if her target is particularly fast. The wringing itself does not seem to cause any physical damage, no matter how severe, and actually seems to even bring a pleasurable sensation rather than a painful one. However, living beings that are wrung out this way still suffer from dangerous dehydration, and can be left as thoroughly shriveled pale husks.

name: Memo Memo no Mi
description: The Memo Memo no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to turn people's memories into strips of film and manipulate them. It was eaten by Charlotte Pudding.

name: Mochi Mochi no Mi
description: The Mochi Mochi no Mi is a Special Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create, control, and transform into mochi. It was eaten by Charlotte Katakuri.

name: Hoya Hoya no Mi
description: The Hoya Hoya no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to summon a genie from their body, making the user a Lamp Human (ランプ人間, Ranpu Ningen?, Viz: "Lampman"). It was eaten by Charlotte Daifuku.

name: Netsu Netsu no Mi
description: The Netsu Netsu no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to emanate heat from their body, making the user a High Heat Human (高熱人間, Kōnetsu Ningen?, Viz: "Bakeman"). It was eaten by Charlotte Oven.

name: Kuku Kuku no Mi
description: The Kuku Kuku no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to turn objects into food. It was eaten by Streusen.

name: Gocha Gocha no Mi
description: The Gocha Gocha no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to merge themselves with other people. It was eaten by Big Mom Pirates member Charlotte Newshi.

name: Oshi Oshi no Mi
description: The Oshi Oshi no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to freely move and shape the ground as though it was malleable like clay. It was eaten by Morley.

name: Kobu Kobu no Mi
description: The Kobu Kobu no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to encourage and rally other people to awaken their latent potential to fight. It was eaten by Belo Betty.

name: Kibi Kibi no Mi
description: The Kibi Kibi no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit which allows the user to create "dango" from their cheeks that can tame animals and those of part-animal nature. It was eaten by Kurozumi Tama.

name: Toki Toki no Mi
description: The Toki Toki no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to send themselves and others forward in time. It was eaten by Kozuki Toki, but with her death, the fruit has returned into circulation.

name: Juku Juku no Mi
description: The Juku Juku no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit which allows the user to mature and decay anything they touch. It was eaten by Shinobu.

Official English Name: Ripe-Ripe Fruit (One Piece Official YouTube Channel)

name: Shiku Shiku no Mi
description: The Shiku Shiku no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to afflict others with diseases. It was eaten by Doc Q.

name: Wapu Wapu no Mi
description: The Wapu Wapu no Mi grants the power of teleportation (瞬間移動, shunkan idō?): the user can warp from place to place instantaneously, as well as teleport other people after touching them.

name: Riki Riki no Mi
description: The Riki Riki no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that grants its user incredible strength. It was eaten by Jesus Burgess.

name: Nomi Nomi no Mi
description: The Nomi Nomi no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user's brain to expand indefinitely with new knowledge, making the user a Brains Human (脳ミソ人間, Nōmiso Ningen?, English: "Brain-Man"). It was eaten by Vegapunk, but with the death of his main body, the status of the fruit is currently unknown.

name: Shima Shima no Mi
description: A user of the Shima Shima no Mi's power can assimilate themselves with the environment of any island, be it natural or artificial, and then manipulate said environment freely. For example, the user can similarly merge themselves with a mountainside or floors built from wood, as long as they are in contact with them.

name: Gabu Gabu no Mi
description: The Gabu Gabu no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that makes the user a Liquor Human (酒人間, Sake Ningen?, VIZ: "Booze-Man"). It was eaten by Vasco Shot.

name: Muchi Muchi no Mi
description: The Muchi Muchi no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to use whips to command anything they hit, turning the user into a Training Human (調教人間, Chōkyō Ningen?, VIZ: "Discipline-Woman"). It was eaten by Kujaku.

name: Nori Nori no Mi
description: The Nori Nori no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to control anything they ride, turning them into a Driving Human (ドライブ人間, Doraibu Ningen?, VIZ: "Driver"). It was eaten by Bluegrass.

name: Ushi Ushi no Mi, Model: Bison
description: The Ushi Ushi no Mi, Model: Bison is a Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows its user to transform into a full bison or a half-bison hybrid at will. It was eaten by Dalton.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ウシウシの実 モデル 野牛（バイソン）
Statistics.Romanized Name: Ushi Ushi no Mi, Moderu: Baison
Statistics.Fruit Debut: Chapter 1070; Episode 1101; One Piece Magazine Vol.12

name: Hito Hito no Mi
description: The Hito Hito no Mi is a Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows its user to transform into a human hybrid or a human at will. It was eaten by the reindeer Tony Tony Chopper, turning him into a Human Reindeer (人間トナカイ, Ningen Tonakai?).

name: Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Falcon
description: The Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Falcon is a Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows its user to transform into a falcon hybrid and a full falcon at will. It was eaten by Pell, and according to him, it is one of the only five types of flying powers ever discovered.

Statistics.Japanese Name: トリトリの実 モデル “隼（ファルコン）”
Statistics.Romanized Name: Tori Tori no Mi Moderu "Farukon"

name: Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Dachshund
description: The Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Dachshund is a Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows its user to transform into a dachshund hybrid and a full dachshund at will. It was "eaten" by Mr. 4's bazooka, Lassoo, through the process developed by Vegapunk.

Statistics.Japanese Name: イヌイヌの実 モデル「ダックスフント」
Statistics.Romanized Name: Inu Inu no Mi, Moderu: Dakkusufunto

name: Mogu Mogu no Mi
description: The Mogu Mogu no Mi is a Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows its user to transform into a mole hybrid and a full mole at will, making the user a Mole Human (モグラ人間, Mogura Ningen?). It was eaten by Drophy, better known by her Baroque Works alias Miss Merry Christmas.

name: Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Jackal
description: The Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Jackal is a Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows its user to transform into a jackal hybrid and a full jackal at will. It was eaten by Chaka.

Statistics.Japanese Name: イヌイヌの実 モデル「ジャッカル」
Statistics.Romanized Name: Inu Inu no Mi, Moderu: Jakkaru

name: Uma Uma no Mi
description: The Uma Uma no Mi is a Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows its user to transform into a horse hybrid and a full horse at will. It was eaten by Gan Fall's bird, Pierre.

name: Neko Neko no Mi, Model: Leopard
description: The Neko Neko no Mi, Model: Leopard is a Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows its user to transform into a leopard hybrid and a full leopard at will, making the user a Leopard Human (ヒョウ人間, Hyō Ningen?). It was eaten by Rob Lucci.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ネコネコの実 モデル“豹（レオパルド）”
Statistics.Romanized Name: Neko Neko no Mi, Moderu: Reoparudo

name: Zou Zou no Mi
description: The Zou Zou no Mi is a Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform into an elephant hybrid and a full elephant at will. It was "eaten" by Spandam's sword, Funkfreed, through the process developed by Vegapunk.

Statistics.Romanized Name: Zō Zō no Mi
Statistics.Official English Name: Eleph-Eleph Fruit (Viz); Elephant-Elephant Fruit (Funimation, Viz); Eleph-Eleph Fruit (ONE PIECE Official Youtube Channel)

name: Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Wolf
description: The Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Wolf is a Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows its user to transform into a wolf hybrid (which almost resembles a werewolf) and a full wolf at will, making the user a Wolf Human (狼人間, Ōkami Ningen?). It was eaten by Jabra.

Statistics.Japanese Name: イヌイヌの実 モデル「狼（ウルフ）」
Statistics.Romanized Name: Inu Inu no Mi, Moderu: Urufu
Statistics.Official English Name: Mutt-Mutt Fruit Wolf Model (Viz) Dog-Dog Fruit Model Wolf (Funimation)

name: Ushi Ushi no Mi, Model: Giraffe
description: The Ushi Ushi no Mi, Model: Giraffe is a Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows its user to transform into a giraffe hybrid and a full giraffe at will, making the user a Giraffe Human (キリン人間, Kirin Ningen?). It was eaten by Kaku, who received it from Spandam. In One Piece episode A, an unknown New World pirate used this fruit, before he was defeated by Portgas D. Ace and finished off by Marshall D. Teach.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ウシウシの実 モデル“麒麟（ジラフ）”
Statistics.Romanized Name: Ushi Ushi no Mi, Moderu: Jirafu

name: Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: King Cobra
description: The Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: King Cobra is a Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows its user to turn into a king cobra hybrid and a full king cobra at will. It can also give the user the ability to create and spit venom. It was eaten by Boa Marigold, who was force-fed it by a World Noble.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ヘビヘビの実 モデル キングコブラ
Statistics.Romanized Name: Hebi Hebi no Mi Moderu Kingukobura

name: Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: Anaconda
description: The Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: Anaconda is a Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows its user to transform into an anaconda hybrid and a full anaconda at will. It was eaten by Boa Sandersonia, who was force-fed it by a World Noble.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ヘビヘビの実 モデル アナコンダ
Statistics.Romanized Name: Hebi Hebi no Mi, Moderu: Anakonda

name: Kame Kame no Mi
description: The primary ability of this fruit grants is the ability to transform into a turtle at will. This turtle has a nearly-impenetrable protective shell (hard as diamond, according to Pekoms), being able to protect against bullets and collapsing buildings.

name: Sara Sara no Mi, Model: Axolotl
description: Following the death of Smiley, the Sara Sara no Mi, Model: Axolotl has taken the form of an apple, as Smiley was near a bag of apples when it was killed. It is a relatively-small, indigo round fruit with a swirl pattern. It also has a curly stem, which curled when the apple was transformed.

Statistics.Japanese Name: サラサラの実 モデル"アホロートル"
Statistics.Romanized Name: Sara Sara no Mi: Moderu Ahorōtoru

name: Mushi Mushi no Mi, Model: Kabutomushi
description: The Mushi Mushi no Mi, Model: Kabutomushi is a Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows its user to transform into a rhinoceros beetle hybrid and full rhinoceros beetle at will. It was eaten by Kabu.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ムシムシの実 モデルカブトムシ
Statistics.Romanized Name: Mushi Mushi no Mi, Moderu: Kabutomushi

name: Mushi Mushi no Mi, Model: Suzumebachi
description: The Mushi Mushi no Mi, Model: Suzumebachi is a Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows its user to transform into a hornet hybrid and full hornet at will. It was eaten by Bian.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ムシムシの実 モデルスズメバチ
Statistics.Romanized Name: Mushi Mushi no Mi, Moderu: Suzumebachi

name: Tama Tama no Mi
description: The Tama Tama no Mi is a Zoan-type Devil Fruit that turns the user's body composition into that of an egg, which if cracked open will cause the user to regenerate into a stronger body that features more and more chicken-like features each time. It was eaten by Tamago.

name: Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Albatross
description: The Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Albatross is a Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows its user to transform into an albatross hybrid and a full albatross at will. It was eaten by Morgans.

Statistics.Japanese Name: トリトリの実 モデル“アルバトロス”
Statistics.Romanized Name: Tori Tori no Mi Moderu Arubatorosu
Official English Name: Bird-Bird Fruit, Model: Albatross (One Piece Official YouTube Channel)

name: Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Tanuki
description: The Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Tanuki is a Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows its user to transform into a tanuki hybrid and a full tanuki at will. It was "eaten" by Tenguyama Hitetsu's teapot, Bunbuku.

Statistics.Japanese Name: イヌイヌの実 モデル たぬき
Statistics.Romanized Name: Inu Inu no Mi, Moderu: Tanuki

name: Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Eagle
description: The Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Eagle is an anime-only Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows its user to transform into an eagle hybrid and a full eagle at will. It was eaten by Buzz.

Statistics.Japanese Name: トリトリの実 モデル"鷲（イーグル）"
Statistics.Romanized Name: Tori Tori no Mi: Moderu "Īguru"

name: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Allosaurus
description: The Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Allosaurus is an Ancient Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform into an allosaurus hybrid and a full allosaurus at will. It was eaten by X Drake.

Statistics.Japanese Name: リュウリュウの実 モデル アロサウルス
Statistics.Romanized Name: Ryū Ryū no Mi Moderu Arosaurusu

name: Zou Zou no Mi, Model: Mammoth
description: The Zou Zou no Mi, Model: Mammoth is an Ancient Zoan-type Devil Fruit, which allows the user to transform into a mammoth hybrid and full mammoth at will. It was eaten by Jack.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ゾウゾウの実 モデル "マンモス"
Statistics.Romanized Name: Zō Zō no Mi Moderu "Manmosu"
Statistics.Official English Name: Eleph-Eleph Fruit Ancient Zoan Model Mammoth

name: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Spinosaurus
description: The Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Spinosaurus is an Ancient Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform into a spinosaurus hybrid and a full spinosaurus at will. It was eaten by Page One.

Statistics.Japanese Name: リュウリュウの実 モデル スピノサウルス
Statistics.Romanized Name: Ryū Ryū no Mi Moderu Supinosaurusu

name: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Pteranodon
description: The Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Pteranodon is an Ancient Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform into a pteranodon hybrid and a full pteranodon at will. It was eaten by King.

Statistics.Japanese Name: リュウリュウの実 モデル プテラノドン
Statistics.Romanized Name: Ryū Ryū no Mi Moderu Puteranodon

name: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Brachiosaurus
description: The Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Brachiosaurus is an Ancient Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform into a brachiosaurus hybrid and a full brachiosaurus at will. It was eaten by Queen.

Statistics.Japanese Name: リュウリュウの実 モデル ブラキオサウルス
Statistics.Romanized Name: Ryū Ryū no Mi Moderu Burakiosaurusu

name: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Pachycephalosaurus
description: The Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Pachycephalosaurus is an Ancient Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform into a hybrid and full version of a pachycephalosaurus at will. It was eaten by Ulti.

Statistics.Japanese Name: リュウリュウの実 モデル パキケファロサウルス
Statistics.Romanized Name: Ryū Ryū no Mi Moderu Pakikefarosaurusu

name: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Triceratops
description: The Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Triceratops is an Ancient Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform into a hybrid and full version of a triceratops at will. It was eaten by Sasaki.

Statistics.Japanese Name: リュウリュウの実 モデル トリケラトプス
Statistics.Romanized Name: Ryū Ryū no Mi Moderu Torikeratopusu

name: Kumo Kumo no Mi, Model: Rosamygale Grauvogeli
description: The Kumo Kumo no Mi, Model: Rosamygale Grauvogeli is an Ancient Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform into a hybrid and full version of a Rosamygale grauvogeli, an ancient species of spider. It was eaten by Black Maria.

Statistics.Japanese Name: クモクモの実 モデル ロサミガレ・グラウボゲリィ
Statistics.Romanized Name: Kumo Kumo no Mi Moderu Rosamigare Guraubogerī

name: Neko Neko no Mi, Model: Saber Tiger
description: The Neko Neko no Mi, Model: Saber Tiger is an  Ancient Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform into a hybrid and full version of a saber-toothed tiger at will. It was eaten by Who's-Who.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ネコネコの実 モデル サーベルタイガー
Statistics.Romanized Name: Neko Neko no Mi Moderu Sāberutaigā

name: Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Phoenix
description: The Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Phoenix is a Mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit which bestows the power to transform into a phoenix (and phoenix hybrid) at will. It was eaten by Marco.

Statistics.Japanese Name: トリトリの実 モデル "不死鳥（フェニックス）"
Statistics.Romanized Name: Tori Tori no Mi Moderu "Fenikkusu"
Official English Name: Bird-Bird Fruit, Model: Phoenix (One Piece Official YouTube Channel)

name: Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Daibutsu
description: The Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Daibutsu is a Mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows its user to transform into a Daibutsu (a giant gold Buddha) at will. It was eaten by Sengoku, the former fleet admiral of the Marines.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ヒトヒトの実 モデル“大仏”
Statistics.Romanized Name: Hito Hito no Mi, Moderu: Daibutsu

name: Uo Uo no Mi, Model: Seiryu
description: The Uo Uo no Mi, Model: Seiryu is a Mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows its user to transform into a hybrid and full Azure Dragon at will. Described as the "strongest class of Devil Fruit", it was once a World Noble treasure before being eaten by Kaidou, after Big Mom had stolen it during the God Valley Incident 38 years ago.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ウオウオの実 モデル "青龍"
Statistics.Romanized Name: Uo Uo no Mi Moderu "Seiryū"
Statistics.Fruit Debut: Chapter 1070; Episode 1101; One Piece Magazine Vol.13

name: Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Kyubi no Kitsune
description: The Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Kyubi no Kitsune is a Mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform into a nine-tailed fox. It was eaten by Catarina Devon.

Statistics.Japanese Name: イヌイヌの実 モデル九尾の狐
Statistics.Romanized Name: Inu Inu no Mi Moderu Kyūbi no Kitsune
Statistics.Official English Name: Dog-Dog Fruit, Model: Nine Tailed Fox

name: Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: Yamata no Orochi
description: The Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: Yamata no Orochi is a Mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform into a hybrid and full version of the Yamata no Orochi, an eight-headed snake or dragon in Japanese mythology. It was eaten by Kurozumi Orochi, but with his death, the fruit has returned to circulation.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ヘビヘビの実 モデル 八岐大蛇
Statistics.Romanized Name: Hebi Hebi no Mi Moderu Yamata no Orochi

name: Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Onyudo
description: The Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Onyudo is a Mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows its user to transform into an onyudo, a large monk yokai, at will. It was eaten by Onimaru.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ヒトヒトの実 モデル“大入道”
Statistics.Romanized Name: Hito Hito no Mi, Moderu: Ōnyūdō

name: Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Okuchi no Makami
description: The Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Okuchi no Makami is a Mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform into a hybrid and full version of an ancient wolf deity at will. It was accidentally eaten by Yamato.

Statistics.Japanese Name: イヌイヌの実 モデル 大口真神（オオクチノマカミ）
Statistics.Romanized Name: Inu Inu no Mi Moderu Ōkuchi no Makami
Statistics.Fruit Debut: Chapter 1070; Episode 1041; One Piece Magazine Vol.13

name: Uma Uma no Mi, Model: Pegasus
description: The Uma Uma no Mi, Model: Pegasus is a Mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows its user to transform into a Pegasus hybrid and a full Pegasus at will. It was eaten by Stronger.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ウマウマの実 モデル ペガサス
Statistics.Romanized Name: Uma Uma no Mi, Moderu Pegasasu

name: Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Bake-danuki
description: The Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Bake-danuki is a video game exclusive Mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit. It allows the user to transform into a bake-danuki, a type of tanuki monster. It was "eaten" by a pen that became Pato.

Statistics.Japanese Name: イヌイヌの実 モデル化狸
Statistics.Romanized Name: Inu Inu no Mi: Moderu Bake-danuki

name: Batto Batto no Mi, Model: Vampire
description: The Batto Batto no Mi, Model: Vampire is a game-exclusive, Mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit that gives the user the ability to turn into a vampire. It was eaten by Patrick Redfield.

Statistics.Japanese Name: バットバットの実 モデル“バンパイア”
Statistics.Romanized Name: Batto Batto no Mi: Moderu Banpaia

name: Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Nue
description: The Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Nue is a non-canon Mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows its user to transform into a nue hybrid and a full nue at will. It was eaten by Toratsugu.

Statistics.Japanese Name: トリトリの実 モデル ヌエ
Statistics.Romanized Name: Tori Tori no Mi, Moderu: Nue

name: SMILE
description: SMILEs are artificial Zoan Devil Fruits created with SAD. They were formerly manufactured by Donquixote Doflamingo and Caesar Clown and were monopolized and consumed by the members of the Beasts Pirates, which created the classifications of the Gifters, Pleasures, and Waiters within the crew.

Statistics.Japanese Name: SMILE（スマイル）; 人造悪魔の実（スマイル）
Statistics.Romanized Name: Sumairu

name: Moku Moku no Mi
description: The Moku Moku no Mi is a Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create, control, and transform into smoke at will, making the user a Smoke Human (煙人間, Kemuri Ningen?). It was eaten by Smoker.

name: Suna Suna no Mi
description: The Suna Suna no Mi is a Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create, control, and transform into sand at will, turning the user into a Sand Human (砂人間, Suna Ningen?). It was eaten by Crocodile.

name: Mera Mera no Mi
description: The Mera Mera no Mi is a Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create, control, and transform into fire at will. It was previously eaten by Portgas D. Ace, and currently by Sabo.

name: Goro Goro no Mi
description: The Goro Goro no Mi is a Logia-type Devil Fruit that grants the power to create, control, and become lightning at will, making the user a Lightning Human (雷人間, Kaminari Ningen?); it is one of the few abilities touted as "invincible" according to Nico Robin. The fruit was eaten by Enel.

name: Hie Hie no Mi
description: The Hie Hie no Mi is a Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create, control, and transform into ice at will, turning them into a Freezing Human (氷結人間, Hyōketsu Ningen?). It was eaten by Kuzan, better known as former Admiral Aokiji.

Official English Name: Hie-Hie Fruit (One Piece Official YouTube Channel)

name: Yami Yami no Mi
description: The Yami Yami no Mi is a Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create, control, and transform into darkness at will, making the user a Darkness Human (闇人間, Yami Ningen?). It was eaten by Marshall D. Teach, also known as "Blackbeard", who stole it from Commander Thatch of the Whitebeard Pirates' 4th division after murdering him.

name: Pika Pika no Mi
description: The Pika Pika no Mi is a Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create, control, and transform into light at will, turning the user into a Light Human (光人間, Hikari Ningen?). It enables the user to move at the speed of light and transport themself by means of reflection. It was eaten by Borsalino, also known as Admiral Kizaru.

Statistics.Romanized Name: Pika Pika no Mi

name: Magu Magu no Mi
description: The fruit's power was first shown during the Summit War of Marineford, but its name was not revealed until SBS Volume 62.

name: Susu Susu no Mi
description: The Susu Susu no Mi is a Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create, control, and transform into soot at will. It was eaten by Karasu.

name: Numa Numa no Mi
description: With the Numa Numa no Mi, Caribou can create bottomless swamps which are impossible to escape from. If someone is caught by the swamp created by Caribou, they will sink more if they struggle. The swamp also serves as a storage space, allowing Caribou to store an infinite amount of whatever he has captured inside his body. The storage space can also be used to help carry a large surplus of food which remains edible over long periods of time, with Caribou noting that he has a month's worth of rations stored within himself. He is able to keep several weapons within himself and bring them out when he needs them. While he can keep creatures alive when they are in his swamp, he can also use the swamp to drown his opponents if he wishes to.

name: Gasu Gasu no Mi
description: The Gasu Gasu no Mi is a Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create, control, and transform into  gas at will. It was eaten by Caesar Clown.

name: Yuki Yuki no Mi
description: The Yuki Yuki no Mi is a Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create, control, and transform into snow at will, turning the user into a Snow Human (雪人間, Yuki Ningen?). The fruit was eaten by Monet, but has returned to circulation following her accidental death at the hands of Caesar Clown.

name: Mori Mori no Mi
description: The Mori Mori no Mi is a Logia-type Devil Fruit that grants the power to create, control, and transform into flora at will, making the user a Forest Human (森人間, Mori Ningen?, English adaptations: "Woodsman"). It was eaten by Aramaki, better known as Admiral Ryokugyu.
